document_data.name: Gleskur's Finemetals of Secomber
document_data.mainbody: '''Gleskur's Finemetals of Secomber''' was a metalworking business in [[Secomber]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Services: Gleskur's Finemetals was a [[dwarf]]-operated workshop that crafted finely-made products, using metal sourced from secret dwarven suppliers who were presumed to make deliveries at night or underground to avoid detection. It was linked by [[merchants' map]] to [[Samril's Fine Blades]] in [[Secomber]], who used their braided [[copper]] [[wire]] for securing the [[leather]] hilt wrappings on weapons such [[longsword]]s.
